conclusion: Determine which container (E, F, G, or H) the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles from points A, B, C, and D.
Liquid from A encounters a green baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid from A continues to the right and flows into container E.
Liquid from B encounters a yellow baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid from B continues to the right and flows into container F.
Liquid from C encounters a green baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid from C continues to the right and flows into container G.
Liquid from D encounters a green baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid from D continues to the right and flows into container H.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into container E, liquid from B flows into container F, liquid from C flows into container G, liquid from D flows into container H.
